context: Hello my friend. How are you today?
I am good as well, thanks . How can I help you today?
Looking for a movie to watch with my boyfriend. I want to make him uncomortable. *uncomfortable
lol i see. How about Fifty Shades of Grey (2015) ? Have you watched it? I think he might be pretty uncomfortable There is also 2 more parts Fifty Shades Darker (2017) and Fifty Shades Freed (2018)
Yes, I've seen it. I haven't seen the other two though. It's not the best movie, but it was okay.
resp: I actually liked Fifty Shades of Grey (2015) . I watched Fifty Shades Darker (2017) with my husband and he was uncomfortable.
